title: Premium Finishes, Two Sparkling Pools, New Convenient Online Services
map_address: 1000 Lake Ridge Parkway near Lake Ridge Parkway
posting_body: ['WELCOME HOME!', 'Our doors are open for self-guided, in-person, and virtual tours!', 'As we value your safety, our community has implemented practices due to COVID-19.', 'To continue protecting the safety of our customers and our team, masks are required!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 35', 'OR Text', '35', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1036 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Premium Finishes', '- Luxury 1, 2 and 3 Bedroom Apartment Homes', 'Community Amenities', '- Enhanced Landscaping', '- Play Park', '- Fitness Studio', '- Outdoor Kitchen', '- Leash Free Dog Park', '- New Pool Lounge Area', '- Package Receiving', '- New Convenient Online Services', '- Two Sparkling Pools', '- Cyber Cafe', '- Clothes Care Center', '- Online Maintenance Requests', '- Tennis Court', '- Lounge Seating Area', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Max Weight of Pets: 50', 'Max Number of Pets: 2', 'Pet Policy: We welcome up to 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Weight limit is 50lbs.', 'We accept cats and dogs.', 'Please call our leasing office for complete pet policy.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Combined gross income for all applicants much equal or exceed three times the rental rate.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Reserve at Gardenlake', '1000 Lake Ridge Parkway, Riverdale, GA, 30296', '4j1gLmnAek2']
